insertpoint

public void insertpoint(int xx,
                        int yy,
                        int grid)
Insert a new point into a segment of this connection which is within close distance to the point of (xx,yy).

Parameters:
xx - the x-position of the insert point
yy - the y-position of the insert point
grid - the measure of the grid

merge

public void merge()
Merge the selected point with its neighbour on the connection if they happen to be overlapped, or just eliminate the selected point if it's on the straight line between its two neighbours.

selectpoint

public boolean selectpoint(int xx,
                           int yy)
Select the point of the connection which is within close distance to the point of (xx,yy).

Returns:
true if there exists one point on the connection which is within close distance to the point of (xx,yy) false otherwise

selectobj

public boolean selectobj(int xx,
                         int yy)
Select this connection as a whole if the point (xx, yy) is within close distance to this connection.

Returns:
true if the point (xx,yy) is within close distance to this connection false otherwise

done

public boolean done()
Check whether this connection is already connected to a destination or still dangling.

Returns:
